message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to offer $16,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable and I can't let it go for less than $18,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
